meta.description: Optimize the production of candy mixes to maximize profit given candy availability.

params.name: profit_per_kg
params.description: Profit per kilogram for each type of mix

params.name: regular_candy_content
params.description: Kilograms of regular candy per kilogram of mix

params.name: sour_candy_content
params.description: Kilograms of sour candy per kilogram of mix

params.name: available_regular_candy
params.description: Total kilograms of regular candy available

params.name: available_sour_candy
params.description: Total kilograms of sour candy available

vars.name: kg_mix
vars.description: Kilograms of each type of candy mix to produce

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit_per_kg[mix] * kg_mix[mix] for mix in MIXES)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling candy mixes

constraints.name: regular_candy_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(regular_candy_content[mix] * kg_mix[mix] for mix in MIXES)
constraints.description: Do not exceed available regular candy

constraints.name: sour_candy_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(sour_candy_content[mix] * kg_mix[mix] for mix in MIXES)
constraints.description: Do not exceed available sour candy
